credits.credits_text:
[c_danger][shake]CREDITS[/]
First of all, credits to [c_danger]@JujuAdams & contributors[/] for the [c_danger]scribble[/] library,
and to all the great and helpful members at the [c_danger]GameMaker Kitchen Discord[/].
Thank you all!
The Assets of the dungeon and the knight were taken from the
free asset pack [c_danger]Fantasy Platformer[/] by [c_danger]YoYoGames[/].
Thanks! Your assets are amazing!
The monsters (Bat, Zombie, Skeleton and Vampire) are used under
CC-BY License from user [c_danger]irmirx[/] from [c_danger]OpenGameArt.org[/]. Thank you!
If I manage to add sounds, they will also be taken from the free asset pack
from [c_danger]YoYoGames[/].

Thank you all for your great resources!
[c_danger][shake]Mike[/]

player_strings.anvil_no_sword: I have no sword... Let's make one!
player_strings.anvil_repair_ok: That will do it for a while...
player_strings.exit_locked: Monsters...Treasures... So much left to do...
player_strings.exit_unlocked: What was that *click*? A door has opened...

key_found.key_found_2: [scale,1.5][shake][c_lgreen]Thanks for holding the key for me!

play_strings.level_exit: Click the portal to leave the level
play_strings.game_over_win:
[fa_middle][fa_center]The [c_yellow]sun[/] rises...
[shake]You stumble out of the castle[/]...
into the light of day...
play_strings.game_over_lose:
[fa_middle][fa_center][scale,1.5][c_danger]The undead feast upon your corpse!
Death is just the beginning...
You will rise as one of them...
[shake]awaiting the next adventurer...[/]
play_strings.time_tooltip:
Leave this level before the hour is over
 or the undead will feast upon your corpse!
play_strings.exit_to_main: [acme28out]Abort game and return to main menu?

intro_strings.storyline:
[fa_top][fa_left][c_danger]"You need to stay just for one night,
but you must enter alone.
Treasure beyond imagination await you,
and... other... things... might await you, too.
Come in and find out!"

[ci_white]The cloaked man spread his arm with an inviting gesture
towards the entrance portal of the castle...
With loud rattle and squeaking the drawbridge lowers
in front of my feet.

And so I accepted the challenge, unsure, what I just committed.
But I am a knight. Brave. Unbreakable.
AND I wear a golden armor! [c_danger][shake]So, what can happen?
intro_strings.no_sounds:
There wasn't enough time to add sounds,
I focussed on the game and random dungeon
and loot and monsters and levels
and...and...and...
